title: Crypto Stocks Rally Pre-Market as Bitcoin Tops $46K
description: Bitcoin climbed over $46,000 for the first time in nearly a month early Friday, extending its gain for the week to nearly 10%.

title: Genesis to return assets after NY settlement on crypto Earn
description: Genesis Global, a bankrupt cryptocurrency lender, has settled with New York Attorney General Letitia James concerning its defunct Earn program. The agreement, announced on Thursday, resolves a lawsuit by James, which accused Genesis and its partners, including Gemini Trust and parent company Digital Currency Group (DCG), of causing significant financial losses to investors through the […]

title: Ripple adjusts institutional XRP sales before court ruling
description: Ripple, the blockchain-based digital payment network, has unveiled significant changes to its XRP sales strategy in its latest quarterly market report for Q4 2023, released on February 7. title: Monero Nosedives After Binance Delisting — Are Privacy Coins Dead? Investors Flock to This ICO Instead
description: Binance, the world’s largest decentralized crypto exchange platform, recently announced plans to delist Monero, (the most popular privacy coin) effective February 20. title: XRP Trading Volume Surged To Remarkable $600M in Q4 2023: Report
description:
According to the recently released Q4 2023 XRP Markets Report, XRP volumes rebounded strongly over the fourth quarter, with daily spot trading reaching $600 million, reflecting a 75-100% increase from the lows of the third quarter. The growth was not peculiar to XRP as other digital assets surged simultaneously, with BTC volumes up 88% Quarter […]
